content.text:
Who believed that the history of society was one of <image 1>?

A. Emile Durkheim
B. Karl Marx
C. Erving Goffmann
D. George Herbert Mead

B. Karl Marx

The image depicts two men arm wrestling, with the text "CLASS STRUGGLE" and "GAME of life in Capitalist America!" which aligns with Karl Marx's theories on class struggle and capitalism.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
